text:
Here's a better version of my idea:

Lived in the USA for 4 years and always struggled to find authentic Indian desserts and snacks.   

The few I did find just didn’t taste right.   

I want the world to experience Indian sweets & snackings made the right way.

cc @_buildspace @_nightsweekends
